title: Noah Dummett Investigation Timeline
description: Comprehensive timeline of events related to Noah Dummett, FTX, and Shuffle.com

events.title: Noah Dummett Enters Crypto
events.description: Self-taught coder begins involvement in cryptocurrency markets

events.title: Joins Alameda Research
events.description: Noah Dummett becomes trader at Alameda Research under Sam Bankman-Fried

events.title: FTX/Alameda Employment Period
events.description: Works as trader at Alameda Research and OTC/Operations at FTX

events.title: Leaves FTX/Alameda
events.description: Noah Dummett departs FTX and Alameda Research operations

events.title: Shuffle.com Founded
events.description: Co-founds Shuffle.com crypto gambling platform with Ishan Haque

events.title: FTX Hack Transactions
events.description: Blockchain evidence shows suspicious transactions involving Noah Dummett addresses

events.title: FTX Files for Bankruptcy
events.description: FTX Trading Ltd. files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection

events.title: Shuffle Rapid Growth
events.description: Shuffle.com grows from $200M to nearly $1B in wager volume

events.title: Public Interviews
events.description: Noah Dummett gives interviews about plans to outshine Stake

events.title: Community Concerns Raised
events.description: BitcoinTalk forum raises serious questions about Shuffle.com

events.title: Theft Allegations Surface
events.description: Allegations emerge that Noah stole $20M from FTX after bankruptcy

events.title: LinkedIn Investigation Published
events.description: Professional blockchain analyst publishes evidence of $25M+ theft

disclaimer: This timeline contains allegations and claims that are under investigation. All blockchain data is publicly verifiable. This document is for informational purposes only.
